name: Multiplier
description: Multiplier Founded in 2020 by co-founders, Sagar Khatri, Amritpal Singh and Vamsi Krishna, Multiplier has fast become the leading global employment platform that makes it easy for companies to employ teams internationally. Its proprietary technology simplifies the employment process by managing the complexities of local compliance, labour contracts, payroll, benefits and taxes. Multiplier, present in 150 countries, enables clients to access global talent with its EOR technology, allowing them to focus on business growth.
features: Multilingual compliant contracts crafted by legal experts
Pay your international employees in their local currencies in minutes.
Manage expenses, leaves and time sheets from a single platform.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Thrive in global markets While we handle your global teams
ShortDescription: Enabling businesses to hire anyone, anywhere in minutes

Highlights.name: Global Benefits
Highlights.description: Motivate & retain talent with top-class benefits.

Highlights.name: ESOP Administration
Highlights.description: Issue Employee Stock Ownership Plan to international hires.

Highlights.name: Global Compliance
Highlights.description: Minimize risks that come with global employment.

enhanced_description: Founded in 2020, Multiplier is a leading global employment platform leveraging its proprietary Employer of Record (EOR) technology to simplify international employment for companies across 150 countries. The platform enables businesses to hire anyone, anywhere in minutes, managing complexities such as local compliance, labor contracts, payroll, benefits, and taxes. Multiplier's solution allows companies to focus on business growth while ensuring global teams thrive. Key features include multilingual compliant contracts crafted by legal experts, localized international payroll in minutes, and a unified platform for managing expenses, leaves, and timesheets. It also supports global benefits, ESOP administration, and ensures global compliance, thereby minimizing risks associated with global employment.
key_use_cases: Managing International Employee Expenses and Time-off
competitive_advantages: Proprietary EOR Technology for simplified global employment
Legal Expertise for Multilingual Compliant Contracts
Unified Platform for HR Operations (expenses, leaves, timesheets)
Support for Global Benefits and ESOP Administration
roi_benefits: Simplified and efficient international employment processes
Enables faster global expansion and access to talent
Mitigation of compliance and legal risks associated with global employment
Improved employee retention and motivation through competitive benefits
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Allows businesses to focus on core growth initiatives
scalability_features: Ability to support rapid expansion of international workforce
